name: Corn Off the Cob Salad
author: User
summary: This summer salad of grilled corn, red pepper, and sun-dried tomatoes is great served warm or at room temperature. It has lots of flavor!
ingredients: 6 ears  white corn, husked and cleaned
4  sun-dried tomatoes (not packed in oil), snipped into small pieces
1 tablespoon kosher salt, or to taste
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat
Grill corn on preheated grill until the kernels are tender and have browned in spots, about 8 minutes
Set aside to until cool enough to handle
Whisk together the melted butter and lime juice in a large bowl
Slice the kernels off of the corn and place into the bowl along with the red pepper and sun-dried tomatoes
Season with salt, pepper, parsley, and garlic powder
